indict.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to officially charge someone with a criminal offence
indict.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He was indicted for vehicular homicide in 1987.
indict.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to officially charge someone with a criminal offence
indict.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: 21 currency traders have been indicted for illegal trading practices.
